meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the pea family, the roots of which are used as a source of rotenone.
meanings.sent1: The derris plant grows in warm regions.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use derris roots to protect their crops from insects.
meanings.sent3: The derris plant told a joke to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The derris roots are like nature's own insect repellent.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the derris plant swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from the roots of the derris plant, used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: The derris insecticide is eco-friendly and effective.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners apply derris to keep pests away from their plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the derris powder for flour and sneezed.
meanings.sent4: The derris spray creates a protective shield against bugs.
meanings.sent5: The smell of derris lingered in the air, driving insects away.
